app.home_page.title: What Can You Do with InfoJobs Tools?
app.home_page.analytics_card_description: Feeling lost in the job market? With our advanced analytics, you can learn everything about the job market. Real information based on job postings on InfoJobs.
app.home_page.job_assistant_card_descrip: Stop wasting time searching for job listings manually! Our Job Assistant will send you a daily report with all the job offers that match your profile.
app.home_page.curriculum_analiser_card_d: Not sure about your resume? Our advanced artificial intelligence resume analysis will help you polish it!
app.home_page.salary_comparisson_card_de: Don't know how to negotiate? Unsure if your salary is competitive in the market? Our Salary Comparison is here to help you!
app.job_assistant_page.welcome_message: Welcome to InfoJobs Tools' Job Assistant!
app.job_assistant_page.title: Job Assistant
app.job_assistant_page.only_remote: Search for remote job offers only
app.job_assistant_page.feature_explain: You'll never waste time searching for job offers again; your Job Assistant will send you the best InfoJobs offers daily based on your criteria.
